landing.heroDescription: A mobile-first platform that helps homeowners manage renovation projects, collaborate with contractors, and track every detail from start to finish.
landing.feature1Description: Keep track of rooms, tasks, materials, and costs all in one place. Visual floor plans connect everything together.
landing.feature2Description: Share your project with contractors, designers, and family members. Built-in translation keeps everyone on the same page.
landing.feature3Description: Monitor progress, manage purchase requests, and keep your project moving forward with clear task management.
landing.ctaDescription: Join homeowners who are taking control of their renovation projects

auth.signInDescription: Sign in to your Renomate account

projects.title: My Projects
projects.noProjectsDescription: Create your first renovation project to get started
projects.createProjectDescription: Start a new renovation project to organize your work
projects.projectDescriptionPlaceholder: Complete kitchen overhaul with new cabinets and countertops
projects.projectCreatedDescription: Your new project has been created successfully.

projectDetail.noScheduledTasksDescription: Add start and finish dates to tasks to see them in the timeline

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.addTaskDescription: Create a new task for your renovation project
tasks.noTasksDescription: Create tasks to track your renovation work
tasks.taskCreatedDescription: The task has been added to your project.

rooms.title: Rooms
rooms.addRoomDescription: Create a new room in your renovation project
rooms.noRoomsDescription: Create rooms to organize your renovation work
rooms.roomCreatedDescription: The room has been added to your project.

spacePlanner.title: Space Planner
spacePlanner.description: Design your floor plan and create rooms
spacePlanner.tipDrawWalls: Draw Walls: Select the Wall tool and click to place wall segments with custom heights
spacePlanner.tipAddRooms: Add Rooms: Use rectangles to define room boundaries and assign colors
spacePlanner.tipNavigate: Navigate: Pan (drag), Zoom (scroll), or use keyboard shortcuts (? for help)
spacePlanner.tipSavePlans: Save Plans: Create multiple floor plans and switch between them
spacePlanner.tipAssignRooms: Assign Rooms: Right-click shapes to assign them to specific rooms
spacePlanner.drawAndVisualize: Draw walls with heights, add rooms, and visualize in Floor Plan, Elevation & 3D views
spacePlanner.manageCreatedRooms: Manage rooms and create new ones directly
spacePlanner.roomsDescription: Create and manage rooms directly here or assign them in the Floor Map Editor.
spacePlanner.keyboardShortcuts: Keyboard Shortcuts: Press ? to view all shortcuts
spacePlanner.viewModes: View Modes: Floor Plan shows 2D top-down, Elevation displays side view with wall heights, 3D provides realistic visualization
spacePlanner.multiPlanProjects: Multi-Plan Projects: Create separate plans for different floors or design alternatives

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.description: Manage your account settings and preferences
profile.profileUpdatedDescription: Your profile has been saved successfully.
profile.changePasswordDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure
profile.passwordChangedDescription: Your password has been updated successfully.
profile.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

roles.title: Team & Invitations
roles.description: Manage project team members and invitations
roles.inviteDescription: Invite a contractor or collaborator to this project
roles.invitationSentDescription: An invitation has been sent to the email address.
roles.noMembersDescription: Invite contractors and collaborators to work on this project

accessLevels.editor: Editor - Can edit tasks and materials
accessLevels.admin: Admin - Full access except delete project
accessLevels.material_requester: Material Requester - View space plan & manage purchase orders
